title: Try!
description: A misplaced forward pass in the middle of the park ends with Young bursting over the line.

title: Try!
description: After a loose pass Tillous-Borde is scampering down the left wing with nobody whatsoever near him! He runs half the length of the pitch and scores!

title: Try!
description: With England on the back foot France shuttle the ball wide left for Nakaitaci who crosses the tryline!

title: Try!
description: Ford cuts inside and is tackled. Haskell recovers and flicks a lovely pass to the right for Watson who crosses the line!

title: Try!
description: Youngs bursts through the centre and between the sticks! Simple as that!

title: Try!
description: Guirado storms towards the posts. He is felled by a crunching tackle but flicks the ball behind him as he meets the turf. Mermox picks the ball from the air and flies over the line.

title: Try!
description: Youngs spots a gap down the right of the French defence and bursts through it. He draws a couple of blue shirts before passing to Ford on his inside for the try!

title: Try!
description: Nowell drops a shoulder to move inside - slips through a couple of weak tackles - and he is over for the try!

title: Try!
description: Suddenly Nakaitaci is tearing down the left wing. He glides inside - drawing a few white shirts - and slips the ball to the big Debaty who powers over!

title: Try!
description: Vunipola picks up the ball and hoists himself over the line from a couple of yards.

title: Try!
description: France go straight up the other end and score the 11th try of the afternoon.

title: Try!
description: Ford delays a pass - dummies - then feeds Nowell who bursts over.

title: Full-time
description: What a brilliant performance by England.  What a brilliant performance by France.  Ireland are six nations champions!!
